faq.description: Have another question? Feel free to reach out or explore our features.

items.title: What is Timero and how does it work?
items.description: Timero is a free online time management tool that combines countdown timer, stopwatch, alarm clock, and world clock features in one platform. Simply visit the website, choose your tool, set your time, and start managing your schedule effectively - no registration required.

items.title: Do I need to create an account to use Timero?
items.description: No! Timero is completely free to use and requires no registration. You can start using all features immediately - timer, stopwatch, alarms, and world clock - without signing up or providing any personal information.

items.title: What time ranges are supported for the countdown timer?
items.description: Timero supports countdown timers from 10 seconds to 16 hours. You can choose from quick presets (10s, 30s, 1min, 5min, etc.) or set custom time with hours, minutes, and seconds. Perfect for short breaks, workouts, cooking, or long work sessions.

items.title: Can I set multiple alarms at once?
items.description: Yes! Timero allows you to set unlimited alarms with custom labels and repeat options. You can set alarms for daily routines, weekdays only, weekends only, or one-time reminders. Each alarm can have its own label like 'Wake Up', 'Exercise', or 'Meeting'.

items.title: How accurate is the stopwatch feature?
items.description: Timero's stopwatch provides precise time tracking with lap functionality. It's accurate to the second and works reliably for timing workouts, activities, or any events. The stopwatch works seamlessly even when you switch browser tabs.

items.title: Can I customize the appearance and sounds?
items.description: Absolutely! Timero offers 20+ theme colors, 20+ notification sounds, and customizable backgrounds. You can personalize the interface to match your preferences and choose notification sounds that work best for you, whether it's a gentle chime or an alert tone.
